description:
Computes the tangent of `x`. The tangent is defined to be the sine of x divided by the cosine of x.

Works on radians only.
The no-data value `null` is passed through and therefore gets propagated.

The computations follow [IEEE Standard 754](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8766229) whenever the processing environment supports it. Therefore, *`tan(pi()/2 + multipliy(pi(), n))`* with `n` being any integer results in Â±infinity. -infinity for negative values passed to `tan`, +infinity otherwise. If the processing environment does not supports it, an exception is thrown.
